channel.title: Comments on: Small Hands
channel.description: Scattered pages from an apocryphal diary

item.title: By: Jenny
item.dc:creator: Jenny
item.description: Don't die. Memorable words. It's what I said as my family and friends shrank in numbers. It's the only rule I have for my husband and 3 kids. And now it is my life's ambition.
item.content:encoded: Don’t die. Memorable words. It’s what I said as my family and friends shrank in numbers. It’s the only rule I have for my husband and 3 kids. And now it is my life’s ambition.
